/usr/local/cuda-8.0/bin/nvcc    -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/KinectFusionApp.dir/src/depth_camera.cpp.o CMakeFiles/KinectFusionApp.dir/src/main.cpp.o -o CMakeFiles/KinectFusionApp.dir/cmake_device_link.o  -L/usr/local/cuda-9.0/lib64  -L/usr/local/share/OpenCV/lib  -L/usr/local/cuda-8.0/lib64/stubs  -L/usr/local/cuda-8.0/lib64  -L/usr/lib/gcc/x86_64-linux-gnu/4.8 ../libKinectFusion.a
